function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through the analysis and synthesis of a wide range of materials from online sources.","Impact":"Risk of contributing to the spread of contagious diseases by collecting and reviewing online sources, potentially increasing exposure to the virus.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety measures during data collection and review, including regular hand hygiene and wearing masks.","Technologies":"Use of virtual meetings and digital platforms to minimize in-person interactions during data collection.","People":"Researchers, analysts, and data collectors involved in the review and collection process.","Owner":"Research institutions, organizations, and individuals responsible for data collection and review."}]}
